<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not a predicate info type we know how to get an edge from.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Operations that must appear first in the block.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a897d843742d5f7e0eba427a397c52775a68fdabff8b3118c0e68625dce3b18c8c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a897d843742d5f7e0eba427a397c52775a68fdabff8b3118c0e68625dce3b18c8c">LN&#95;Middle</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only case we can&#39;t directly compare them is when they in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block, and both have localnum == middle.  In that case, we have to use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comesbefore to see what the real ordering is, because they are in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.DFSIn != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.DFSIn || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.DFSOut == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.DFSOut) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Equal DFS-in numbers imply equal out numbers&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SameBlock = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.DFSIn == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.DFSIn;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to put the def that will get used for a given set of phi uses,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before those phi uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So we sort by edge, then by def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that only phi nodes uses and defs can come last.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SameBlock &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.LocalNum == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a897d843742d5f7e0eba427a397c52775a308aa71e66e6522ef65504c0250cf5d2">LN&#95;Last</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.LocalNum == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a897d843742d5f7e0eba427a397c52775a308aa71e66e6522ef65504c0250cf5d2">LN&#95;Last</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs-compare/#a58a6da5fa5e7c0c7a745f3fd51e620cc">comparePHIRelated</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isADef = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.Def;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isBDef = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Def;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s possible for the defs and uses to be null.  For branches, the local</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LN&#95;beginning), so we won&#39;t be in this function. For assumes, we will end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// up here, beause we need to order the def we will place relative to the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PredicateInfoBuilder::stackIsInScope(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueDFSStack &amp;Stack,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs">ValueDFS</a> &amp;VDUse)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stack.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it&#39;s a phi only use, make sure it&#39;s for this phi node edge, and that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use is in a phi node.  If it&#39;s anything else, and the top of the stack is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EdgeOnly, we need to pop the stack.  We deliberately sort phi uses next to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the defs they must go with so that we can know it&#39;s time to pop the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when we hit the end of the phi uses for a given def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stack.back().EdgeOnly) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!VDUse.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a209c5ea40a3297a48893d027b7b3f35b">U</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(VDUse.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a209c5ea40a3297a48893d027b7b3f35b">U</a>-&gt;getUser());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check edge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;EdgePred = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>-&gt;getIncomingBlock(&#42;VDUse.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a209c5ea40a3297a48893d027b7b3f35b">U</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EdgePred != getBranchBlock(Stack.back().PInfo))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use dominates, which knows how to handle edge dominance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(getBlockEdge(Stack.back().PInfo), &#42;VDUse.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a209c5ea40a3297a48893d027b7b3f35b">U</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">          VDUse.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a19d8714858d8500a598848f43b46f925">DFSOut</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a0d3b0002f320808a94594a6718946d7ba2187e1021a911b3807cc1bea2eb1a9ca">Stack</a>.back().DFSOut);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Assume : AC.assumptions()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;IntrinsicInst&gt;</a>(Assume))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT.isReachableFromEntry(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getParent()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">        processAssume(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getParent(), OpsToRename);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now rename all our operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  renameUses(OpsToRename);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given the renaming stack, make all the operands currently on the stack real</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by inserting them into the IR.  Return the last operation&#39;s value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PredicateInfoBuilder::materializeStack(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Counter,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             ValueDFSStack &amp;RenameStack,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OrigOp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the first thing we have to materialize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RevIter = RenameStack.rbegin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; RevIter != RenameStack.rend(); ++RevIter)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RevIter-&gt;Def)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Start = RevIter - RenameStack.rbegin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The maximum number of things we should be trying to materialize at once</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// right now is 4, depending on if we had an assume, a branch, and both used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and of conditions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RenameIter = RenameStack.end() - Start;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">       RenameIter != RenameStack.end(); ++RenameIter) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RenameIter == RenameStack.begin() ? OrigOp : (RenameIter - 1)-&gt;Def;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs">ValueDFS</a> &amp;Result = &#42;RenameIter;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ValInfo = Result.PInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ValInfo-&gt;RenamedOp = (RenameStack.end() - Start) == RenameStack.begin()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             ? OrigOp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             : (RenameStack.end() - Start - 1)-&gt;Def;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For edge predicates, we can just place the operand in the block before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the terminator.  For assume, we have to place it right before the assume</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to ensure we dominate all of our uses.  Always insert right before the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relevant instruction (terminator, assume), so that we insert in proper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order in the case of multiple predicateinfo in the same block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of named values is used to detect if a new declaration was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// added. If so, that declaration is tracked so that it can be removed when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the analysis is done. The corner case were a new declaration results in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a name clash and the old name being renamed is not considered as that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// represents an invalid module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PredicateWithEdge&gt;</a>(ValInfo)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(getBranchTerminator(ValInfo));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDecls = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;IF = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getParent(), Intrinsic::ssa&#95;copy, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumDecls != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PI.CreatedDeclarations.insert(IF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateCall(IF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getName() + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(Counter++));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PI.PredicateMap.insert(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>, ValInfo&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result.Def = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PAssume = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PredicateAssume&gt;</a>(ValInfo);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PAssume &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should not have gotten here without it being an assume&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert the predicate directly after the assume. While it also holds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// directly before it, assume(i1 true) is not a useful fact.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa241826e10b4a9bf77c3115e7160d3c7">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(PAssume-&gt;AssumeInst-&gt;getNextNode());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDecls = F.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuisd/#a739d53294bc38cd6b0b23332f9994c0eac5f4a93ee302ab324b2d6be4da7d1995">IF</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">          F.getParent(), Intrinsic::ssa&#95;copy, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumDecls != F.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PI.CreatedDeclarations.insert(IF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CallInst &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateCall(IF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PI.PredicateMap.insert(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>, ValInfo&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.Def = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RenameStack.back().Def;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instead of the standard SSA renaming algorithm, which is O(Number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions), and walks the entire dominator tree, we walk only the defs +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses.  The standard SSA renaming algorithm does not really rely on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dominator tree except to order the stack push/pops of the renaming stacks, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that defs end up getting pushed before hitting the correct uses.  This does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not require the dominator tree, only the &#42;order&#42; of the dominator tree. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// complete and correct ordering of the defs and uses, in dominator tree is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contained in the DFS numbering of the dominator tree. So we sort the defs and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses into the DFS ordering, and then just use the renaming stack as per</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// normal, pushing when we hit a def (which is a predicateinfo instruction),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// popping when we are out of the dfs scope for that def, and replacing any uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with top of stack if it exists.  In order to handle liveness without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// propagating liveness info, we don&#39;t actually insert the predicateinfo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction def until we see a use that it would dominate.  Once we see such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a use, we materialize the predicateinfo instruction in the right place and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Use this algorithm to perform fast single-variable renaming in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// promotememtoreg and memoryssa.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PredicateInfoBuilder::renameUses(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;OpsToRename) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ValueDFS&#95;Compare <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid/#ab357441fcd1ea1f9b0d27c12700f6023a1328ed43be8173506f59f88c9bfd8b8c">Compare</a>(DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute liveness, and rename in O(uses) per Op.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : OpsToRename) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Visiting &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Counter = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;ValueDFS, 16&gt;</a> OrderedUses;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ValueInfo = getValueInfo(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert the possible copies into the def/use list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// They will become real copies if we find a real use for them, and never</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// created otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;PossibleCopy : ValueInfo.Infos) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ValueDFS VD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine where we are going to place the copy by the copy type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The predicate info for branches always come first, they will get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// materialized in the split block at the top of the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The predicate info for assumes will be somewhere in the middle,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it will get materialized in front of the assume.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here we require a stable sort because we do not bother to try to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses in the same instruction do not have a strict sort order</span></CodeLine>
